chunks.zh: 减肥有使用 美司格鲁肽 的朋友么
chunks.en: Are there any friends who have used Semaglutide for weight loss?

chunks.zh:
中年发福体脂超标。自己减肥成功过，就是控制嘴，但是实在太难。自己运动量是达标的，每周都健身房，但是实在管不住嘴。

最近看美司格鲁肽好像出了口服的。有没有用过的朋友说说效果跟副作用。。
chunks.en:
Middle-aged spread with excessive body fat. I've succeeded in losing weight before, just by controlling my diet, but it's too difficult. My exercise volume meets the standards, and I go to the gym every week, but I really can't control my mouth.

Recently, I saw that Semaglutide seems to have an oral version. Has anyone used it? Tell me about the effects and side effects.

chunks.zh: 不在无医师指导下私自用药，我自认为这是对我健康的尊重和负责。
chunks.en: I believe that using medication privately without a doctor's guidance is a sign of respect and responsibility for my health.

chunks.zh: @goodman111 “医院将近 50%以上的诊断是错误的” 这句话有出处嘛……
chunks.en: @goodman111 Is there a source for the statement 'Nearly 50% of hospital diagnoses are incorrect'?

chunks.zh: 我以前诊断有糖尿病，加上暴饮暴食，胖了一段时间，后来疯狂跑步 3 个月，瘦了 40 多斤，然后膝盖就坏了，前叉韧带重建（跟跑步没关系），但后来跑步基本上就不成了。
chunks.en: I used to be diagnosed with diabetes, plus overeating, and gained weight for a while. Later, I ran like crazy for 3 months and lost more than 40 pounds, but then my knees broke and I had anterior cruciate ligament reconstruction (which had nothing to do with running), but later I basically couldn't run anymore.

chunks.zh: 然后开始撸铁，刚开始是真上瘾，坚持一年肌肉杠杠的，然后又开始被迫恢复到一天工作十几个小时的日子，不睡觉，不运动，长期开车，结果又废了，血糖也升高了。
chunks.en: Then I started weightlifting. At first, I was really addicted. I persisted for a year and my muscles were strong, but then I was forced to go back to working more than ten hours a day, not sleeping, not exercising, and driving for long periods of time, and as a result, everything was ruined again and my blood sugar also rose.

chunks.zh: 第一次转打针，是手术前，为了控制血糖，必须注射胰岛素，手术完成医生给我开了利拉鲁肽，一天一针。
chunks.en: The first time I switched to injections was before the surgery. In order to control blood sugar, I had to inject insulin. After the surgery, the doctor prescribed liraglutide, one injection a day.

chunks.zh: 打了以后根本吃不下饭，我老板都疯了，以为我故意的，怕我身体熬不住垮了（我一个人干四个人的活），其实这就是药的结果，打了一年，瘦了一点，但因为不锻炼，后来打了就没反应了。
chunks.en: I couldn't eat at all after the injection. My boss was crazy and thought I was doing it on purpose, fearing that my body couldn't handle it and would collapse (I do the work of four people alone). In fact, this is the result of the medicine. After one year of injections, I lost a little weight, but because I didn't exercise, I had no reaction later.

chunks.zh: 最近一年因为血糖控制不住去了医院，医生给我开了司美格鲁肽，当时还比较新，也不是减肥神药，但一个月只给一针，一针打 5 次。
chunks.en: Recently, I went to the hospital because I couldn't control my blood sugar. The doctor prescribed Semaglutide. At that time, it was relatively new and not a miracle weight loss drug, but only one injection was given per month, and one injection was used for 5 times.

chunks.zh: 我感觉打了以后，跟我以前得了反流性食管炎一样，吃多了就反胃，不吃饭也反胃，喝酒也反胃，总之必须定时吃饭，别多吃，也别不吃。
chunks.en: I feel that after the injection, it's like I had reflux esophagitis before. I feel nauseous if I eat too much, nauseous if I don't eat, and nauseous if I drink alcohol. In short, I must eat regularly, don't eat too much, and don't skip meals.

chunks.zh: 刚开始吃油的就想吐，其实健身以后，我就不怎么吃油腻的东西了，几乎不吃糖（最近开始喝无糖可乐），水果一直大量的吃（我不吃酸的东西）。
chunks.en: At first, I wanted to vomit when I ate oily food. In fact, after exercising, I don't eat greasy food much anymore, and I hardly eat sugar (I recently started drinking sugar-free Coke). I have always eaten a lot of fruit (I don't eat sour things).

chunks.zh: 因为有腿上，我没法出去做跑步骑车之类的活动，游泳也不方便，跳绳更没法一下子做几千个，所以我选择了跑步机上走路这种有氧，加上有氧操。
chunks.en: Because of my legs, I can't go out for activities like running or cycling, swimming is also inconvenient, and I can't do thousands of jump ropes at once, so I chose aerobics like walking on a treadmill, plus aerobic exercises.

chunks.zh: 最近开始撸铁。说了这么多，我就想告诉你，想减重，第一，想明白为什么，你想得到什么，你做的事情有没有给自己奖励。
chunks.en: I recently started weightlifting. After saying so much, I want to tell you that if you want to lose weight, first, think clearly about why, what you want to get, and whether what you are doing rewards you.

chunks.zh: 第二，不要太难，太难了坚持不下来。
chunks.en: Second, don't make it too difficult, it's too difficult to stick to it.

chunks.zh: 第三，远离负能量，你为自己而活，胖也好，瘦也好，只有你对自己的奖励最重要。
chunks.en: Third, stay away from negative energy, you live for yourself, fat or thin, only your rewards to yourself are the most important.

chunks.zh: 我建议你去看看热辣滚烫，别管电影人怎么胡说八道，你就想想，你这一生，该活成张三李四王五的样子，还是你自己？
chunks.en: I suggest you go watch 'YOLO'. Don't care what the filmmakers are talking nonsense about. Just think, in this life, should you live like Zhang San, Li Si, Wang Wu, or yourself?

chunks.zh: 你想不想沙滩上让姑娘看看你的腹肌？你想不想套上一件外套，在清晨的风中随意奔跑？你想不想掌握自己的人生？你想不想让别人看着你的背影，默默说一声牛逼？
chunks.en: Do you want to show girls your abs on the beach? Do you want to put on a coat and run freely in the morning breeze? Do you want to control your own life? Do you want others to look at your back and silently say awesome?

chunks.zh: @ETiV 这广告打得又快又长，工号给下，老板给你加上
chunks.en: @ETiV This ad is so fast and long, give me your employee ID, and the boss will add it in.

chunks.zh: 就没有人纠正一下楼主那玩意儿叫司美格鲁肽吗？
chunks.en: Isn't anyone going to correct the original poster that that thing is called Semaglutide?

chunks.zh: 一眼软广：一个号提出问题，一个号几分钟写一大堆回复
chunks.en: Soft advertisement at a glance: one account raises the question, and one account writes a lot of replies in a few minutes.

chunks.zh: @PbCopy111 你们不会真觉得类似散播焦虑的长文现在还会有受众吧
chunks.en: @PbCopy111 You don't really think that long articles like spreading anxiety still have an audience, do you?

chunks.zh: @saz #24 自己肥胖不焦虑还要靠别人散播的话，那你的心脏会给你答案
chunks.en: @saz #24 If you're not anxious about your own obesity and have to rely on others to spread it, then your heart will give you the answer.

chunks.zh: 效果肯定有，我四个月前 106.2Kg ，现在 93.7Kg ，目标 80Kg 。
chunks.en: The effect is definitely there. I was 106.2Kg four months ago, and now I am 93.7Kg, with a goal of 80Kg.

chunks.zh: 口服药现在国内应该还没上市，我买的渠道都是黑市来的…😂香港的药贩子，从印度买的药，往国内卖。
chunks.en: Oral medicine should not be available in China yet. The channels I buy are all from the black market...😂 Hong Kong drug dealers buy medicine from India and sell it to China.

chunks.zh: 药盒上写明了印度卢比的价格，是我付款价格的 1/3 。
chunks.en: The price in Indian rupees is marked on the medicine box, which is 1/3 of the price I paid.

chunks.zh: 副作用因人而异：我吃到现在没啥事儿，当然风险最高的是胰腺炎，我打算过完年去专门检查一下
chunks.en: Side effects vary from person to person: I haven't had any problems so far, but the highest risk is pancreatitis, and I plan to go for a special checkup after the New Year.

chunks.zh: 我一同事打针，说打了胃疼、不再继续了；我一朋友在我的安利下也买了片剂，上个月才开始用，最宜开始有些腹泻，现在没问题了。
chunks.en: A colleague of mine got injections and said that their stomach hurt after the injection and they stopped; a friend of mine also bought tablets under my recommendation and started using them last month. They had some diarrhea at the beginning, but now it's fine.

chunks.zh: 口服药的英文名叫这个：rybelsus ，你可以 Google 一下，应该能搜到一篇“瑞倍适”药品说明书，没记错的话应该是台湾网站，里面写的非常明白，会有哪些副作用、禁忌药品什么的
chunks.en: The English name of the oral medicine is: rybelsus. You can Google it, and you should be able to find a medicine instructions for 'Rybelsus'. If I remember correctly, it should be a Taiwan website, and it is written very clearly, including what side effects and prohibited drugs there are.

chunks.zh: @ETiV 啊，这效果很一般啊感觉，我最高 106kg ，八个月不到最低减到 74kg ，纯靠饿和运动
chunks.en: @ETiV Ah, the effect is very average. My highest was 106kg, and I lost the lowest to 74kg in less than eight months, purely by starving and exercising.

chunks.zh: 当然，肥胖是基因问题，毕业参加工作后现在又回来了。。。
chunks.en: Of course, obesity is a genetic problem, and it has come back after graduating and starting work.

chunks.zh: 反正，对我们胖子来说减肥是一辈子的事儿，稍微不注意大吃大喝很快就能胖起来，而有的人基因好怎么都不太可能胖。让人羡慕又嫉妒
chunks.en: Anyway, for us fat people, losing weight is a lifelong thing. If we don't pay attention and eat and drink too much, we can gain weight quickly, while some people have good genes and are unlikely to gain weight no matter what. It's enviable and jealous.

chunks.zh: @ETiV 感谢
chunks.en: @ETiV Thanks

chunks.zh: @foxkiller 医院将近 50%的诊断是错误的，全世界都一样。医生最常说的一句话就是“回去观察观察”。
chunks.en: @foxkiller Nearly 50% of hospital diagnoses are wrong, the same all over the world. The sentence that doctors say most often is 'Go back and observe'.

chunks.zh: @foxkiller 我是衡量了，我超重带来的影响，感觉已经大于他的副作用。。
chunks.en: @foxkiller I have weighed the impact of my being overweight, and I feel that it is already greater than its side effects.

chunks.zh: 如果有甲状腺结节的话，需要慎重。
chunks.en: If you have thyroid nodules, you need to be cautious.

chunks.zh: 另，我有朋友用这个，刚开始的时候效果很好。最近见他的时候，感觉反弹很明显。他已经连续用了 1 年多了。
chunks.en: Also, I have a friend who used this, and the effect was very good at the beginning. When I saw him recently, I felt that the rebound was very obvious. He has been using it continuously for more than 1 year.

chunks.zh: @foxkiller 有相关研究，不过印象里研究显示的比例恐怕没有他说的这么高。
chunks.en: @foxkiller There are relevant studies, but I don't think the proportion shown in the research is as high as he said.

chunks.zh: 价格多少。如果太贵 我还是饿+健身房运动吧 现在健身 3 个月 深蹲干到 200 斤了 194-》 184 了
chunks.en: How much does it cost? If it's too expensive, I'll just starve + gym exercise. I've been working out for 3 months and my squat is 200 pounds, 194 -> 184 pounds.

chunks.zh: @broken123 看看朋友能帮忙邮寄不，你深蹲应该 200 公斤把。。。200 斤才 100 公斤， 我拉蹲 170 公斤，但是也瘦不了，主要管不住嘴
chunks.en: @broken123 See if a friend can help mail it to you. Your squat should be 200 kilograms... 200 pounds is only 100 kilograms. I do a 170 kilogram squat, but I can't lose weight, mainly because I can't control my mouth.

chunks.zh: 胰腺炎算是很凶险的风险了。。。
chunks.en: Pancreatitis is a very dangerous risk...

chunks.zh: 这个有效啊，但如果不改变饮食，照样反弹。
chunks.en: This is effective, but if you don't change your diet, it will still rebound.
